### Government Tender Announcement
===========================

To provide a modern and innovative bilingual Protected B Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) Financial Management solution to support departments in delivering better digital services by providing better accessibility, privacy, simplicity, inclusion, and security within government of Canada's daily financial management operations.

### Tender Details
----------------

*   **Title (EN)**: Software-as-a-Service Financial Management Solution
*   **Title (FR)**: logiciel-service de solution de gestion financière
*   **Reference Number (EN)**: WS3607536204-Doc3751378484
*   **Amendment Number (EN)**: 5
*   **Publication Date (EN)**: December 15, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date (EN)**: February 15, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date (EN)**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date (EN)**: None
*   **Tender Status (EN)**: Expiring
*   **Gouvernment Services and Procurement Administration (EN)**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (EN)**: Included
*   **Portal Location (EN)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14737471?extsite=MTQ3Mzc0NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg[tag]

### Contract Condition
-------------------

Bids submitted after 14:00:00 on February 15, 2023 will be declared non-responsive.

### Contracting Entity Details
-----------------------------

*   The successful respondent will work with Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Department's needs link: Treasury Board (TBS)
*   Address: 90, rue Elgin, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0R5, Canada

### Technical Criteria
--------------------

The selected solution must be classified as Protected B, allowing multiple departments to deliver digital services, allowing users to use the cloud-based application infrastructure and provide better accessibility, privacy, simplicity, inclusion, and security.
